name: Extreme Prejudice
text: Your hatred of a particular type of creature has honed your killer instinct.
prerequisites: Seething Hatred, sneak attack +3d6, studied target class feature.
benefit: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature you selected as the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you use d8s to roll sneak attack damage instead of d6s.
staminaText: When you succeed at a sneak attack against a creature that is not the target of your Seething Hatred feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to treat the creature as if it were the target of your Seething Hatred for that attack.
text_zh: 有一种生物你至为痛恨，他们的出现就足以挑动你的杀戮神经。
prerequisites_zh: 憎恶集中，偷袭+3d6，杀手杀戮目标职业能力。
benefit_zh: 每当你对一个你在 专长选择的生物发动偷袭攻击时，你的偷袭伤害骰上升到d8而非普通的d6。
staminaText_zh: 如果目标并非憎恶集中专长指定的敌人，你可以花费5点耐力来将其视为憎恶集中专长所指定的敌人。
